original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 24.4. Hetuduka, Āsavagocchaka
analyzed: hetuduka

original: Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ
analyzed: na hetum noāsavam dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetu

original: noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ noāsavaṁ
analyzed: noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum noāsava

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ca nahetu āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ ca na hetu āsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nanahetuṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na na hetum noāsavam dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nahetuṁ noāsavañca nanahetuṁ noāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na hetum noāsavañca na na hetum noāsavañca dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na hetum na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nanahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na na hetum na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nanahetuṁ nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nanahetuṁ
analyzed: nana hetum nanoāsavam dhammam paṭicca hetu noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā nana hetu

original: nanoāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noāsavo ca nahetu noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: na noāsavam dhammam paṭicca hetu noāsavaḥ ca na hetu noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ nanoāsavañca nanahetuṁ nanoāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na hetum na noāsavañca na na hetum na noāsavañca dhammam paṭicca na hetu noāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na anāsavam dhammam paccayā hetu anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nanahetuṁ naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na na hetum na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na hetu āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: na hetum na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca hetu āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā nava ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na hetum na āsavañca iva na anāsavañca dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ ca iva sa āsavaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na hetum na anāsavam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu sa āsavaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca pe avigate pañca

original: Nahetuṁ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na āsavañca iva na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca hetu āsavaḥ ca iva āsava sampayuttaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum na āsava vippayuttam ca iva na no ca āsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu āsava sampayuttaḥ ca iva no ca āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ nasāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum āsava vippayuttam na sa āsavam dhammam paṭicca na hetu āsava vippayuttaḥ sa āsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nahetuṁ āsavavippayuttaṁ naanāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā hetu āsavavippayutto anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetum āsava vippayuttam na anāsavam dhammam paccayā hetu āsava vippayuttaḥ anāsavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
